message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,400,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of this product.  Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,550,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
